oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pipe network analysis in an educational campus- a case study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jothiprakash, V
Natarajan, C
Muralidharan, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pipe network
EPANET
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The existing pipe network system at NIT Tiruchirappalli has been analysed using gradient algorithm (EPANET software). The campus has three distinct zones, namely the institutional zone, the residential zone and the hostel zone. Each zone has been analysed using EPANET for their adequacy, separately and as a whole. The analysis was carried out for peak demand and average demand conditions. It is found that the present system is adequate and that it can be managed with proper timing of operation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Journal of Indian Water Works Association, XXXII(2) 116-131
